titles.title: Great Lakes Fishery Research Reauthorization Act
Great Lakes Fishery Research Reauthorization Act
Great Lakes Fishery Research Reauthorization Act
Great Lakes Fishery Research Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize funding to monitor, assess, and research the Great Lakes Basin, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Capito without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 229.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Environment and Public Works
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
